label: Individual Protection Steps
quote: Steps individuals may take to protect themselves;

label: Incident Investigation and Mitigation Actions
quote: What the Contractor and/or the Government are doing to investigate the incident, mitigate the incident, and protect against any future incidents;

label: Contact Information for Incident Inquiries
quote: Information identifying who individuals may contact for additional information.

label: Notification to Affected Individuals
quote: The Contracting Officer may direct the Contractor to: (1) Provide notification to affected individuals as described in paragraph (b).

label: Credit Monitoring Duration Requirement
quote: Provide credit monitoring services to individuals whose PII or SPII was under the control of the Contractor or resided in the information system at the time of the incident for a period beginning the date of the incident and extending not less than 18 months from the date the individual is notified.

label: Unaffiliated Credit Monitoring Provider
quote: Credit monitoring services shall be provided from a company with which the Contractor has no affiliation.

label: Triple Credit Bureau Monitoring
quote: At a minimum, credit monitoring services shall include: (i) Triple credit bureau monitoring;

label: Daily Customer Service for Credit Monitoring
quote: (ii) Daily customer service;

label: Fraud and Change Alerts in Credit Monitoring
quote: (iii) Alerts provided to the individual for changes and fraud;

label: Enrollment and Fraud Alert Assistance
quote: (iv) Assistance to the individual with enrollment in the services and the use of fraud alerts.

label: Dedicated Call Center Establishment
quote: Establish a dedicated call center. Call center services shall include:

label: Dedicated Customer Service Phone Number
quote: A dedicated telephone number to contact customer service within a fixed period;

label: Credit Report and Score Access Information
quote: Information necessary for registrants/enrollees to access credit reports and credit scores;

label: Weekly Call Center Reporting
quote: Weekly reports on call center volume, issue escalation (i.e., those calls that cannot be handled by call center staff and must be resolved by call center management or DHS, as appropriate), and other key metrics;

label: Call Escalation to Management or DHS
quote: Escalation of calls that cannot be handled by call center staff to call center management or DHS, as appropriate;

label: Customized FAQs Approval
quote: Customized Frequently Asked Questions, approved in writing by the Contracting Officer in coordination with the Component or Headquarters Privacy Officer;

label: Customer Service and Fraud Resolution Contact Information
quote: Information for registrants to contact customer service representatives and fraud resolution representatives for credit monitoring assistance.

label: Delivery of Sustainable Products and Services
quote: The Contractor shall ensure that the sustainable products and services required by this contract are— (i) Delivered to the Government;

label: Furnishing Sustainable Products and Services for Government Use
quote: The Contractor shall ensure that the sustainable products and services required by this contract are— (ii) Furnished for use by the Government;

label: Incorporation of Sustainable Products in Construction
quote: The Contractor shall ensure that the sustainable products and services required by this contract are— (iii) Incorporated into the construction of a public building or public work;

label: Review Green Procurement Compilation Guidance
quote: The Contractor should review the GPC when determining which statutory purchasing programs apply to a specific product or service.

label: Security Protections for Controlled Unclassified Information
quote: Adequate Security means security protections commensurate with the risk resulting from the unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction of information.
section: HSAR 3052.204-72 Safeguarding of controlled unclassified information

label: Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability Protections for Information Systems
quote: This includes ensuring that information hosted on behalf of an agency and information systems and applications used by the agency operate effectively and provide appropriate confidentiality, integrity, and availability protections through the application of cost-effective security controls.
section: HSAR 3052.204-72 Safeguarding of controlled unclassified information

label: Protection of Homeland Security Agreement Information
quote: Homeland Security Agreement Information means information ... that is required to be protected by that agreement.

label: Protection of Homeland Security Enforcement Information
quote: Homeland Security Enforcement Information means unclassified information ... the unauthorized disclosure of which could adversely impact the mission of the Department;
